players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

You: "
"
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso and I investigated him. Be cautious."

Charlie: "I believe Diana's investigation is crucial.
"
Diana: "I will continue to investigate and protect the villagers. Be mindful of Bob's intentions."
You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Alice last night. Diana has figured this out, so be careful with your words and actions."
Charlie: "I am a villager and I don't know who the mafioso is. I will keep an eye on Bob's actions."
